entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: University of Victoria 2:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: ESE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 10.
